pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extremely Fast Hashing of R Objects, Raw Data and Files using 'xxHash' Algorithms // Extremely fast hashing of R objects using 'xxHash'. R objects are hashed via the standard serialization mechanism in R. Raw byte vectors and strings can be handled directly for compatibility with hashes created on other systems. This implementation is a wrapper around the 'xxHash' 'C' library which is available from https://github.com/Cyan4973/xxHash.
